about_the_game:
TCM RACING 2 Is a sandbox racing game where you can do anything!

You are a TCM Group member, who witnessed the attacker's revenge in the event of complete destruction. The Portal that the group crafted is for safety and you must reach it before they deliver more damage against you

Once you're in, you're full on freedom, ready to do anything you'd like. (but there is a twist.)



- Multiplayer
- Mode Designer (Create your own game-modes)
- 4 weapons
- Missions
- Many game-modes to choose from
detailed_description:
TCM RACING 2 Is a sandbox racing game where you can do anything!

You are a TCM Group member, who witnessed the attacker's revenge in the event of complete destruction. The Portal that the group crafted is for safety and you must reach it before they deliver more damage against you

Once you're in, you're full on freedom, ready to do anything you'd like. (but there is a twist.)



- Multiplayer
- Mode Designer (Create your own game-modes)
- 4 weapons
- Missions
- Many game-modes to choose from

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: AMD Bulldozer/Excavator/Piledriver | Intel Core 2nd Gen
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Midrange GPU with 2GB of VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan hardware support/Drivers is required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel or AMD (2.4 GHz or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 or GTX 1050 Ti or Better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 Yosemite
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Metal support is required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11 Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 and higher, Apple Silicon M1 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 Core GPU (M1) or better, AMD Radeon or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

name: TCM RACING 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: AMD Bulldozer/Excavator/Piledriver | Intel Core 2nd Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Midrange GPU with 2GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might require increased Swap memory size for some game modes.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel or AMD (3 GHz or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 or GTX 1050 Ti or Better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: A car sandbox game with no true goals laid out. It's up for you to decide what you want to do!
